Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: Another aspect needed to support this is related to deployment payloads: Today, we push deployment payloads around the network that contain Dockerfile instructions. Instead, we should only push code-packages around the network and let the endorser supply a contextually correct Dockerfile on the fly.

Action.author: greg.haskins
Action.body: I am pleased to report that this is now fixed, I believe. I will run a test where I point the configuration to something like the ghaskins/ dockerhub namespace and confirm, but I think everything should be in place to support binary deployment.
